Package com.sleepycat.db

Class ReplicationManagerSiteInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sleepycat.db.ReplicationManagerSiteInfo
  • public class ReplicationManagerSiteInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    A simple wrapper class to hold information needed to define a replication site.

    ReplicationManagerSiteInfo objects are returned by Environment.getReplicationManagerSiteList

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      ReplicationHostAddress addr
      The replication site's address
      int eid
      The replication site's identifier
      LogSequenceNumber maximumLSN
      The highest log number acknowledged as durable by this site.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      ReplicationManagerSiteInfo​(ReplicationHostAddress hostAddr, LogSequenceNumber max, int eid)
      Create a ReplicationManagerSiteInfo with the given information, isConnected defaults to false.
      ReplicationManagerSiteInfo​(ReplicationHostAddress hostAddr, LogSequenceNumber max, int eid, boolean isConnected)
      Create a ReplicationManagerSiteInfo with the given information.
      ReplicationManagerSiteInfo​(ReplicationHostAddress hostAddr, LogSequenceNumber max, int eid, boolean isConnected, boolean isElectable, boolean isPeer, boolean isView)
      Create a ReplicationManagerSiteInfo with the given information.
